about_the_game:
Set in a vast open world, Semko combines action-packed combat with creature collection. As you uncover the mysteries of ancient Obelisks, forge bonds with captured creatures who fight alongside you in strategic battles. Master an arsenal of weapons while exploring a world filled with emotional storytelling and challenging puzzles.

*Note: Semko is Work-In-Progress and is very early and subject to change - everything you see is not final.

Capture Creatures

Explore the Open World and find all kinds of Creatures to capture and fight along side you against other Creatures and Duelists.

Battle!

Befriend diverse creatures throughout your journey, each bringing unique abilities to combat. Command your companions in strategic battles against wild creatures and skilled duelists. Switch seamlessly between weapons - from swift daggers to mighty greatswords - while coordinating attacks with your newly found friends.

Fight with your Sword, Two-Hand Sword, Spear or Daggers:

Defend yourself with Shields!

Use your Bow!

Ancient Mysteries

Uncover the truth behind mysterious Obelisks scattered across the land. Solve intricate puzzles that guard their secrets while following a story filled with memorable characters, emotional moments, and unexpected twists.

Freedom

Move around as you wish.

  • Climb towering cliffs and structures

  • Soar through skies with gliding gear

  • Unlock flying mounts for aerial exploration

  • Unlock or rent mounts for ground exploration

Climb:

Glide:

Living World

Gather Mushrooms, Apples, Ores, Wood and other resources to make food, upgrade your equipment, prepare survival supplies or to fulfill quests.
